name: WebGL2RenderingContext.copyTexSubImage3D
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.copyTexSubImage3D() method of the WebGL API copies pixels from the current WebGLFramebuffer into an existing 3D texture sub-image.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'copyTexSubImage3D' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 3.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glCopyTexSubImage3D' in the 'OpenGL ES 3.0' specification.
